7: Action and Env Specific - Activates when the current block is directly above the target with similar angle, actions push the block down by hitting the keypoint 8.
206: Action Trajectory Specific - Activates on actions that start from the left side of the target block and make gradual turns to go right and above the target block to approach the current block. Consistent (and small) distance between target and current block. Late denoising steps.
922: Environment Specific - Activates when the block is pretty much on the target but slightly to the right. The actions are always closest and adjusting the top right corner of the block in small increments.
